showerReviews.reviewText: You got just 2 jobs really. Making sure the pumps work and the showers are clean is about the bare minimum for a truck stop. …

I’d give it zero stars. The associate wanted to control how many people could shower at a time so he cut off most of the showers making me and others wait over 50 minutes for his convenience. Then I go into ask about the hold up and he …

Pathetic showers
Shower will be ready in 30 seconds after use bcoz they just come & use towels provided to customers & mop with them that’s it
No shower available at 2am, lazy staff, very rude, they don't want to work, easy money, truck drivers do not come here very bad experience

Terrible customer service I'm going to do my best not come through this pilot anymore I asked to get my shower refunded since they were down the front said they were not doing it when other pilots refund showers all the time and were rude …

It’s 0131 in the morning and I’m being told it’s an hr wait for a shower, by this disrespectful clerk. There’s no excuse for this, as much money as we pay in these truck stops. You can’t come in at 1 in the morning and get a shower! I could …

… have to put it on the staff that is here today. ( I went back inside for a shower and coffee this morning hoping that, with change of shift, that I would see something different. No such luck. Only 1 shower was ready, the other four …

Waited over 1hr 20mins for a shower at 5am at this location wasn’t busy at all once shower opened up never did my phone get a notification then I went up to desk and ask lady to see she went back and checked and told me anything she never …

Horrible place. Manager and staff was very rude and unprofessional. Regarding showers, all Pilot truck stops provide free courtesy towels except at this location. If you need towels to shower, you'll have to give the staff your driver's …
I spent the night here and couldn’t even take a shower in the morning because there wasn’t anyone here to clean them

locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Good location, found truck parking in the afternoon. No problem. Men's bathroom smelt pretty bad. Besides that. Nice and quiet for 10 The only downside is they don't have any trash cans in the trucking parking lot. They have two washes two dryers. They both work. A Popeyes inside if you're about that grease life
David McleanLocal Guide · 836 reviews · 963 photos
If you're passing through and need a dependable, clean, and well-run place to stop, TA Florence Travel Center is as good as it gets. …

Why are we doing this??? Why are the showers wide open like this so water gets everywhere? Is it your way of making sure they mop? Such a dumb design. That being said, this is a decent pilot. Not the best by miles but decent. Showet was …
They have a popeyes inside & serve breakfast daily with welcoming employees but the washers & dryers need maintenance
Plenty of gas pumps. Restrooms. Pork chops and popeyes offered inside.

locations.title: Petro Travel Center
locations.content: Petro Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: One of the better locations with good shower, laundry and evening parking available
… Update: went in to shower later and was told the shower was ready for us and clean. Well there was poop all over the handicap seat and even some on the walls.
showerReviews.uniqueId: Shellie n Wes Storie_…_Update:_went_in_to_shower_later_and_was_told_the_Edited a year ago

showerReviews.reviewText: … it here. Clean and quiet. I haven't noticed any reserved parking here. That's a plus. The shower was clean. The laundry room was clean, and the machines looked new. I had dinner and breakfast here. Dinner was good. Breakfast, however, …

… paper towels from the ladies room. That was not the worst part of it all. He walked to the shower area and sat then whiped his knose on the sleeve of his white work jacket. Other than this one male. It's a great place. Friendly   kind …

The showers were very clean. The shower attendant  was very sweet and kind for it being 430 in the morning.on Friday the 16 of Feb.  The food at iron skillet  was ok. Would not mind have to park there again if we have a run though again.

You'd think that if you buy over 600.00 in diesel you could get 2 free drink refills and a shower for free. Not sure what the deal is with that, but had to buy drinks at the fuel desk, then have the clerk put a shower on the card to get the …

Very disappointed in the Petro this morning past 3 other trucks tops to stop here for a shower only to be told there none clean and no one will be here to clean them for another hour. Big talk on the xm about ta/petro making their stops …

Good place. The only reason they didn't get 5 stars is lack of water faucet. Shower tank fill up needs faucet, not the nozzle on the fuel island. Would stop again but make sure I don't need water first.

Ice cold shower.....they should pay to have anyone use it!    My co-driver had identical experience.....not a fluke.  Trying food next.  Let ya know......edit:. Food and servers good.. upgraded to two stars... FIX THE SHOWER
No more free shower credits for shop work. F this chain. They've lost a customer that brings tens of thousands of dollars a year in shop work.

locations.content: Florence Travel Plaza may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: I didn't fuel or shower here, but I did use the bathroom and eat here. Everybody seems friendly, the food was good and good priced. A nice little dirt lot to park a truck in, but overall a good place for stopping to eat or take a half hour …

Stopped here for a few hours of sleep and a shower. Well worth it. Shower was a bit outdated but extremely clean. 5 clean towels and very hot water. Even came with a nice chair to sit and put your socks on. Staff was very friendly as well …

Shower was clean. Fuel was competitively priced.  If using a fuel card, they charge credit price.  If paying cash, it is 10 cents less per gallon.  Parking lot is a well maintained dirt lot with good parking.  People are friendly.  Restaura …
Shower is ok . Hamburgers and hotdogs ok . But no breakfast selection  . No country ham no gravy biscuits No tenderloin.  Friendly  but charge for everything.

showerReviews.reviewText:
You got just 2 jobs really. Making sure the pumps work and the showers are clean is about the bare minimum for a truck stop.
If lazy employees aren't going to let anyone take a shower, the least they can …
Nice place to stop for the bathroom and snacks! The bathroom was clean and accessible. A lot of food, coffee, and snacks. It also includes a little gift shop.

Not a bad location. Having both Subway and Taco Bell, it tends to get a little crowded, so expect the lines to be a little longer. Food was fast and well done. Standard Pilot truck items. Seemed clean and orderly.

I did my 34 hour break here. Showers were decent, store was clean. Only problem I had was both nights I was approached multiple times from people begging for money. Looked like drug addicts. The woman was tweakin and all fidgety. The guy …

I’d give it zero stars. The associate wanted to control how many people could shower at a time so he cut off most of the showers making me and others wait over 50 minutes for his convenience. Then I go into ask about the hold up and he …

Not clean at all, fuel island trashed. Wait for showers is pathetic, employees walk around store ignoring customers as they dance to music. Come on Pilot, you can do better. I'm switching back to Loves Truck Stop.

showerReviews.reviewText: Good Place to fuel up as a trucker but the toilet space in the shower is pathetic. How can anyone take a dump with the toilet dispenser right in the way literally. I have to lean on the sink because it's blocking my shoulders from sitting …

… a few times and it’s awesome, always found park here, last night I arrived past 23:00 and still have plenty of parking. Y’all crying babies go crowd some place else. People in the store are friendly, my shower was a good, no complaints.

$17 for a shower to see Mold on the sealing showers. Old green stained tiles. Super dusty vents & fans. Make shure you wear sandals. So you don't catch something on your feet.(fungus) everything is 90's built. Your hard earn money for motel …

… it's clean, and the staff is friendly, and there's plenty of parking space, but... Is it really that expensive to change some equipment in the showers?  The 21st century is on the street, but in the shower there is a chair that Lincoln …
The shower room is the cleanest than most of the other flying j

… place is ehhhhhh. Bathroom faucet was loose. The pizza was good. The shower had tiles missing off of the sink but the water pressure was pretty decent.  Tons of open available parking.  Cashier was grumpy but yeah well. Not the best one …

The store manager and maintenance man really need to go sit on the toilet in shower 2.... HOW is a person supposed to sit on a toilet that is positioned where the paper roll holder sticks out over the bowl? Mount the roll holder higher. Did …

… . Very friendly staff. The shower was one of the best showers ever lots of pressure with constant hot water, absolutely no wait to get a shower and was very clean. restrooms were also very clean and well stocked. I needed wi-fi and …

… . My mother and I have had to use it on occasion, even spending the night since we have been looking for a place to live and I had heard that people use these facilities as places to rest, do laundry, take showers and even sleep. So …

… is one of the laziest if not the laziest crew I've seen. Only keeps 1 shower open at a time and doesn't clean them until you need one and then you have to wait. And apparently won't brew coffee at night Is what the night crew says.These …

showerReviews.reviewText: Moldy showers, no face cloths, water spraying out all parts of the shower head and covering,  as well as both soap holers broken off. …

… aisles, out of supplies by the coffee area. Ladies room has torn paper towels on the counter, unswept floor, overflowing trash cans in the stalls. Definitely NOT paying for a shower here. Worried about the germs in there Just sayin...

Lazy workers with attitudes. Check out lady was very rude and waited hour for shower because no was cleaning them even though there was a line. One guy was outside smoking for 20 minutes.. restrooms were disgusting and filthy

… go to Love's quite often. This loves had the filthiest bathroom I have ever seen! The shower had a bunch of mold in it and the outside of the toilet must not have been wiped for weeks! They had not even swept the floor for crying out loud!

Very poor customer service. When in to shower was advised the shower were down. Attempted to use the restroom but was unable to do so due to poor housekeeping by staff members. Went to the manager and she blamed the poor housekeeping of the …
Lock door or someone will walk in on you shower system seems to be out of wack here, shower aren’t cleaned her and clog up something terrible
Shower rooms Needs Better Attention We Still in the Woods For Covid Cases Floating Around!!

This review is newer than most others on here. The really bad reviews of dirty showers were from before they redid the showers. They are clean now, and modern. Nice hot water, everything is fine. Some diesel pumps don't work but mine worked …

Good morning everyone. My respect and appreciation to people who work there. They are honest and great.I am truck driver who lost a wallet before 2 days at the shower cabin. I understood that thing 5 hours later . I panicked cause I didn’t …

It’s alright , just your typical loves … they have Arby’s , it’s pretty clean , showers are decent . At least my shower , shower 7 didn’t really have good pressure but it was enough to get the job done . I have decent Verizon signal close …
